Data: Anwar Ali to Finch, no run slightly back of length on the off stump, Finch stays back and defends
Anwar Ali to Finch, no run back of length outside off, punched towards the covers

Anwar Ali to Finch, OUT practice catch for mid-on! Anwar Ali breaks the stand. It was short of length outside off, Finch didn't move much and was maybe it two minds to punch it down the ground or clear mid-on and ended up chipping it to Irfan at mid-on. Finch's poor run on the tour continues
Anwar Ali to Smith, no run on length outside off, Smith leans forward and gets an edge on the pads
Anwar Ali to Smith, no run fullish outside off, Smith takes a step across and whips to mid-on
Anwar Ali to Smith, 1 run back of length outside off, Smith moves across and turns it to deep midwicket
Babar to Smith, 1 run flighted on off, pushed down gently to mid-on for a quick single
Babar to Warner, 1 run takes a step down to take it on the full and drives to long-on
Babar to Smith, FOUR runs uses his feet very well to not let it turn and he whips it from outside off with the wrists, wide of mid-on for four
Babar to Smith, no run wider outside off, Smioth stays back and gets an edge on the pads
Babar to Smith, FOUR runs drifts it down the leg side and Smith helps it towards the fine leg area where there's nobody as Shafiq had to dive to keep it in but it went for four
Babar to Smith, 2 runs uses his feet again and whips it past midwicket in the gap, he's middling everything and they get two more
Anwar Ali to Warner, 1 run short of length outside off, tapped to sweeper cover easily for one
Anwar Ali to Smith, no run back of length outside off, Smith stays back and defends
Anwar Ali to Smith, no run goes a touch shorter and Smith defends it gently to short cover
Anwar Ali to Smith, 1 run angles in towards middle and leg from back of length, tucked to deep midwicket for one
Anwar Ali to Warner, no run on length from around leg stump, turned to midwicket off the pads
Anwar Ali to Warner, 1 run on length on middle and angling away, tapped towards cover and they get a quick single as the fielder misfields
Babar to Warner, no run turns it in from off stump, Warner defends it back
Babar to Warner, no run goes a touch outside off, Warner goes back and punches it back
Babar to Warner, no run leans forward this time and blocks the delivery from outside off
Babar to Warner, 1 run length delivery turning in from off, helped with the turn to deep midwicket
Babar to Smith, no run drifts in in towards length outside off, Smith defends it back
Babar to Smith, no run drifting in further towards middle stump now, punched back off the back foot
Anwar Ali to Warner, no run length delivery outside off, pushed down to mid-off
Anwar Ali to Warner, no run outswing from leg stump and the extra bounce surprises Warner a bit as he defends
Anwar Ali to Warner, 2 runs short of length from middle and angling away, jabbed off the back foot towards deep midwicket in the gap for two
Anwar Ali to Warner, 1 run on the pads this time and it's clipped to deep midwicket for one
Anwar Ali to Smith, no run back of length outside off, Smith defends it off the back foot
Anwar Ali to Smith, no run shorter outside the off stump and it's punched to mid-off

Babar to Warner, FOUR runs comes down the track to drive the ball from outside off, it wasn't full at off but he got enough and found the gap between cover and mid-off for four. Umar Akmal chased but lost
Babar to Warner, no run turns it in towards off stump, he defends off the back foot
Babar to Warner, 1 run goes back in the crease and turns to deep midwicket for one
Babar to Smith, no run comes down a step and flicks to mid-on
Babar to Smith, no run flighted around off stump, he defends it back
Babar to Smith, 1 run uses his feet again and drives to mid-on
Anwar Ali to Smith, 1 run back of length outside off, taps it late to third man for one
Anwar Ali to Warner, 1 run back of length on middle and leg, turned with the wrists to deep midwicket
Anwar Ali to Smith, 1 run on length with some room outside off, guides it late to third man for another

Anwar Ali to Warner, 1 run chance for a run out! On length around off, whipped to midwicket and Warner wants one, sets off, the fielder gets the throw in but it's not a direct hit and Warner dives desperately
Anwar Ali to Smith, no run on length outside off, defends it on the off side
Anwar Ali to Smith, no run cuts in in from outside off, Smith stays back and defends
Babar to Warner, SIX runs slog-sweep, and that's been hit extremely well. It was full on off stump, and Warner sinks to one knee and swats that high over deep midwicket to bring up his half-century
Babar to Warner, no run a bit of flight on off stump, drops onto a good length, and Warner defends watchfully off the front foot
Babar to Warner, no run a touch short, worked off the pads towards square leg
Babar to Warner, 1 run on the pads once more, tucked away to deep midwicket
Babar to Smith, 1 run down the pitch, whipped from outside off to wide long-on
Babar to Warner, no run back of a length outside off, worked to short midwicket with a lot of bottom hand
Anwar Ali to Smith, 2 runs short, and it's pulled from outside off towards the straight midwicket boundary. Maqsood covers a lot of ground from deep square leg to stop that
Anwar Ali to Smith, no run back of a length outside off, punched to short cover
Anwar Ali to Smith, 1 run length ball, angling in towards off stump, Smith comes forward and pushes it wide of short cover, Fawad dives to his left to stop the ball

Anwar Ali to Warner, 1 run on the pads, clipped away to deep backward square leg. The throw nutmegs the keeper, and the point fielder is luckily in place to save the overthrows, because the ball was travelling very quickly
Anwar Ali to Smith, no run length ball outside off, may have been the slower ball, defended off the front foot
Anwar Ali to Smith, 1 run shuffles across and works this from middle stump down to deep backward square leg
Afridi to Smith, 2 runs full on middle and leg, driven wide of long on
Afridi to Smith, 1 run full again, on middle stump, driven to long-off
Afridi to Warner, no run quickish length ball, straightens towards off stump, defended carefully off the back foot
Afridi to Warner, 1 run tossed up outside off, pushed to long-off
Afridi to Smith, 2 runs down the pitch now, and lovely wrist-work to whip that from outside off, into the big gap to the left of deep square leg
Afridi to Smith, no run quick and full on the stumps, defended down the pitch
Irfan to Warner, no run looks to drag a length ball from wide outside off and smash it over mid-on, mishits it and sends it rolling along the ground towards that fielder
Irfan to Warner, 2 runs shortish ball, rising towards the stomach, Warner gets off his feet and works it away to the right of deep backward square leg
Irfan to Warner, no run fuller now, angling in towards middle stump, defended towards short midwicket
Irfan to Warner, no run slower ball, comes in from outside off. Warner lets it come to him and defends with a straight bat
Irfan to Warner, 1 run back of a length outside off, pulled, not timed very well, to square leg
Irfan to Smith, no run back of a length, angling across. Smith shuffles across his crease and works that from outside off towards midwicket
Afridi to Warner, no run goes back to a fairly full ball on the stumps, works it with the turn towards midwicket
Afridi to Warner, 2 leg byes slower now, a little leg-sideish, and he looks to clip it off his legs, only gets a bit of pad on it down to fine leg
Afridi to Warner, no run full on middle and leg, clipped to short midwicket

Afridi to Warner, OUT and Lala strikes! That was much slower than the previous ball, and it dropped on Warner, on off stump, and he pushed at it and lobbed the ball straight back to the bowler, at a nice, catchable waist height
Afridi to Bailey, no run back of a length on middle stump, worked to midwicket from deep in the crease
Afridi to Bailey, no run a bit of width outside off, but it isn't quite short enough to cut, hit straight to short cover
Irfan to Smith, 1 run back of a length, and he stands tall and works it off his hips towards deep backward square leg
Irfan to Bailey, OUT got him! That was a length ball, angling away outside off, and Bailey followed it and sliced it straight to the man at backward point
Irfan to Maxwell, no run back of a length, on off stump, defended towards point
Irfan to Maxwell, 1 run back of a length outside off, Maxwell lets it come to him and steers it away to third man
Irfan to Smith, 2 runs walks across the stumps, and works this back of a length ball from outside off towards square leg
Irfan to Smith, no run slower ball outside off, Smith lets it go through to the keeper
Afridi to Maxwell, no run angled in towards leg stump, a bit of turn, and Maxwell defends with the spin into the off side
Afridi to Maxwell, 1 run short ball, and he clubs it away from outside off down to long-on
Afridi to Smith, 1 run down the pitch nowm driven inside-out to deep cover point
Afridi to Maxwell, no run length ball on middle and leg, defended off the front foot towards short cover
Afridi to Maxwell, no run low full-toss on middle stump, whipped wristily to midwicket
Afridi to Maxwell, no run full on leg stump, clipped to midwicket
Tanvir to Smith, no run back of a length on off stump, defended towards short cover
Tanvir to Smith, no run back of a length outside off, didn't come on at all, and Smith, who was looking to punch through the covers, ended up punching it back to the bowler
Tanvir to Smith, 1 run back of a length, worked from outside off with a deft flick of the wrist towards square leg
Tanvir to Maxwell, 2 runs back of a length, angling across, chopped away to the right of third man
Tanvir to Maxwell, no run angled across again, and Maxwell looks to steer that away with an open face, gets an outside edge but it drops safely short of Sarfraz
Tanvir to Maxwell, 1 run short, a bit of width, cut firmly to the right of third man
Afridi to Maxwell, 1 run shortish ball outside off, steered away wide of backward point
Afridi to Smith, 1 run tossed up, and Smith was a little early on the shot, but adjusted to check his drive down to long-off
Afridi to Maxwell, 1 run full, worked from middle and off towards midwicket
Afridi to Smith, 1 run back of a length on middle stump, tucked away to the left of short fine leg
Afridi to Maxwell, 1 run full and wide, comes forward and chips it over cover
Afridi to Smith, no run quickish length ball on off stump, defended back to the bowler
Tanvir to Maxwell, 1 run back of a length on off stump, punched away to deep cover point
Tanvir to Smith, no run back of a length, clipped from off stump towards short midwicket
Tanvir to Smith, 1 run shuffles across, tucks it away from an off-stump line down to deep midwicket
Tanvir to Maxwell, no run stays back to a length ball on the stumps, and has to jam his bat down hurriedly to prevent it from hitting his pads
Tanvir to Maxwell, 1 run loopy slower ball on a yorker length just outside off, jams his bat down and squeezes it away backward of point
Tanvir to Smith, 1 run length ball outside off, driven to deep cover point
Afridi to Smith, no run quickish length ball outside off, defended towards point
Afridi to Smith, 1 run short, a bit of width, chopped away to the left of deep cover
Afridi to Maxwell, FOUR runs full-toss on the stumps, and he swats it away contemptuously over midwicket, one bounce and over the rope
Afridi to Maxwell, 1 run full on leg stump, clipped to the left of short fine leg
Afridi to Smith, 1 run full outside off, driven down to long-off

Afridi to Maxwell, 3 runs full, a bit of width, and that's a beautifully caressed drive through extra cover. Deep cover runs to his right and stops it with his boot. Not sure who the fielder was. Babar, maybe?
Anwar Ali to Maxwell, 1 run offcutter, comes back in towards off stump from just back of a length. Maxwell waits on it and chops it away towards third man
Anwar Ali to Smith, 1 run back of a length outside off, punched to deep point with a straight bat
Anwar Ali to Maxwell, 1 run back of a length outside off, dabbed away to third man
Anwar Ali to Smith, no run back of a length, angling in towards off stump, defended towards short cover
Anwar Ali to Smith, 2 runs comes in off the pitch towards off stump again, Smith shuffles across and works it towards deep square leg
Anwar Ali to Smith, 1 run back of a length again, outside off, he's been bowling there right through this over, and Smith comes half-forward and steers it away towards deep point
Afridi to Smith, no run looks to stride down the pitch but it's a little too quick for that, defends it back to the bowler
Afridi to Smith, no run quick, on a good length, angling in towards off stump, defended back to the bowler
Afridi to Smith, 1 run now he strides out of his crease and reaches the pitch of the ball to whip it away towards deep midwicket

Afridi to Maxwell, OUT Afridi gets another. Maxwell goes for the slog-sweep, but he's only managed to pick out Umar Amin, who runs to his left from deep square leg and takes a superb diving catch. Just about managed to hold on even though he landed on his elbows and the ball threatened to pop out
Afridi to Smith, 1 run works this length ball off the stumps, towards square leg
Afridi to Hughes, no run length ball on the stumps, worked with the turn towards square leg
Anwar Ali to Smith, no run back of a length on off stump, defended into the off side
Anwar Ali to Smith, no run walks across his stumps, and defends back to the bowler
Anwar Ali to Smith, 1 run back of a length now, and he shuffles across to tuck it away towards square leg
Anwar Ali to Hughes, 1 run on the pads, and Hughes is off the mark with a little clip towards midwicket
Anwar Ali to Smith, no run fullish ball on off stump, clipped to short midwicket
Anwar Ali to Smith, 1 run back of a length, a bit of width outside off, punched to deep cover point
Afridi to Smith, 1 run down the pitch, clipped off the toes towards short midwicket, where Anwar dives to his right but can't stop cleanly
Afridi to Hughes, no run shuffles across as this turns in from outside off and defends from the crease
Afridi to Hughes, 1 run full and wide, steered away backward of point
Afridi to Smith, no run back of a length, punched to cover
Afridi to Smith, 2 runs tossed up outside off, ends up as a full-toss that Smith hits uppishly, just wide of short extra cover, down to long off
Afridi to Smith, 1 run drags this down the leg side, and Smith tucks it away towards deep square leg
Babar to Smith, no run angled in towards off from wide of a crease, Smith comes forward and coaxes it towards point
Babar to Smith, 1 run down the pitch now, and he drives down to long-on to bring up his fifty
Babar to Hughes, no run full, whipped from middle and off to short midwicket
Babar to Hughes, 1 run down the pitch now, clipped down to long on
Babar to Smith, 1 run down the pitch again, pushed with a straight bat to long-off
Babar to Hughes, no run slants this across Hughes, who dabs it with the angle to backward point
Afridi to Smith, no run
Afridi to Smith, 2 runs worked away to deep backward square leg
Afridi to Smith, 1 run down the pitch, clipped down to wide long-on
Afridi to Hughes, no run down the pitch now, turns this towards short midwicket
Afridi to Hughes, 1 run doesn't turn in as far as he expected from outside off, turned his bat face too quickly, and the outside edge runs away to short third man
Afridi to Smith, no run full and wide, driven to cover point, who's standing on the edge of the circle
Babar to Hughes, 1 run turns it in from outside off, tucked with the turn to deep square leg for one
Babar to Smith, no run makes room and pushes the length ball towards cover
Babar to Smith, no run takes a step down now and pushes it back
Babar to Smith, 1 run slightly shorter towards middle and leg, pushed down to long-on for one
Babar to Hughes, no run moves across and this one hardly turned after pitching outside off, Hughes defended delicately
Babar to Hughes, no run leans forward and blocks the length delivery from outside off
Tanvir to Smith, 1 run short ball angled across towards off, pulled to midwicket
Tanvir to Hughes, no run cramped for room as Hughes moves across a bit, looks to pull but the ball doesn't bounce as much and moves in to hit him around the waist

Tanvir to Hughes, OUT loud appeal and Tanvir gets him! Hughes has reviewed it. The ball swung in after pitching outside off, hit him on the knee roll in front of the off stump and that would have hit the stumps, says the ball-tracking technology. Hughes has to walk back
Tanvir to Haddin, no run length delivery outside off is angled across, Haddin lets it go
Tanvir to Haddin, no run touch wider outside off, Haddin leans forward and pushes to cover
Tanvir to Haddin, 1 run on leg and was headed to middle, Haddin goes back and tucks it on the leg side for one
Irfan to Haddin, no run slightly full and angling across outside off, pushed to cover
Irfan to Haddin, no run edged but that fell short of the keeper! Back of length outside off, Haddin went for the cut and got an inside edge but that didn't carry
Irfan to Haddin, 1 run on length outside off with the angle, helps it to third man for one
Irfan to Smith, no run bit of extra bounce after it pitched on middle, moved away and surprised Smith as he defended it to cover

Irfan to Smith, OUT full on off now, driven down to mid-on, and Haddin is a few feet outside the crease. The fielder - Anwar Ali - was alert to spot that and rocketed a flat throw for a direct hit. It's gone to the third umpire and Haddin is a few inches short. A dismissal made out of nothing, with full credit to the fielder
Irfan to Smith, 1 run length delivery on the off stump, turned a bit wide of mid-on for one and he keeps strike
Tanvir to Smith, no run swings it across a bit from outside off, pushed to cover point off the front foot
Tanvir to Smith, no run touch shorter just outside off, Smith goes back in the crease and defends it back
Tanvir to Smith, no run on length now close to off, no room whatsoever and he defends again
Tanvir to Smith, no run tad shorter on similar line close to off, Smith defends to short cover now
Tanvir to Smith, 1 run strays towards middle and leg, and it's full, flicked to deep square leg for one
Tanvir to Faulkner, no run tight line and length on off stump, Faulkner blocks it back
Babar to Smith, no run charges down, Babar pitches it shorter and it's pushed to cover
Babar to Smith, no run towards the pads now and it's clipped to backward square leg
Babar to Smith, 1 run much fuller on off stump, driven down to long-off for one
Babar to Faulkner, no run flights it on length on off, Faulkner leans forward and blocks
Babar to Faulkner, no run bit shorter and coming in towards off, he stays back and pushes to cover
Babar to Faulkner, 1 run slightly short on off and it's turned wide of midwicket for one
Anwar Ali to Faulkner, no run back of length around off, whipped down to mid-on
Anwar Ali to Faulkner, no run fuller outside off and it's driven sweetly, but straight to cover
Anwar Ali to Faulkner, no run shorter outside off, Faulkner stays back and taps it to cover point
Anwar Ali to Faulkner, 1 run angled towards the pads now, flicked to deep midwicket for one
Anwar Ali to Smith, 1 run moves across for the short of length delivery outside off and pulls it around to deep backward square leg
Anwar Ali to Faulkner, no run fuller and angling in, flicked straight to midwicket
Babar to Smith, 1 run pretty slow and drifting in towards middle, pushed down easily to long-on
Babar to Faulkner, no run flighted on off, defends it back to the bowler
Babar to Faulkner, 1 leg bye shorter towards the leg stump, Faulkner gets it to short fine leg off the pad
Babar to Smith, 1 run flighted well outside off, pushed a bit wide of cover for one
Babar to Faulkner, 2 runs on length on middle and leg, he goes back and tucks it to deep backward square leg for one
Babar to Faulkner, no run length delivery outside off, pushed with a straight bat to cover
Anwar Ali to Smith, FOUR runs short of length towards middle, Smith moves across and whips it past short fine leg for a four in the gap. He knows there has been a drought of boundaries and runs, both
Anwar Ali to Smith, 1 run on length outside off now, helped to third man for one
Anwar Ali to Faulkner, no run slightly short of length on off stump, turned to midwicket
Anwar Ali to Faulkner, 1 run full on off now, pushed down to long-on for one off the front foot
Anwar Ali to Smith, 1 run makes room towards the leg side, Anwar pitches it short and a swish is cut at cover point by a dive for one
Anwar Ali to Faulkner, no run short of length outside off, Faulkner cuts hard but gets a bottom edge towards point
Afridi to Smith, 1 run drifts one full towards the leg stump, he comes down and drives to long-on
Afridi to Faulkner, no run goes back to whip the ball to leg but gets it on the body after some turn
Afridi to Faulkner, 1 run this one turns in too and Faulkner tucks it on the leg side
Afridi to Smith, 1 run legspinner on length outside off, cut off the back foot to sweeper cover
Afridi to Faulkner, no run googly comes in from outside off, keeps low and Faulkner misses while trying to cut
Afridi to Faulkner, 1 run tucked to square leg for one run
Babar to Faulkner, no run flighted outside off, defends with a forward lean to cover
Babar to Faulkner, no run angles it in from around off, Faulkner looks to turn it to leg but gets it on his pad
Babar to Faulkner, no run leans forward and pushes to cover again, no room again
Babar to Faulkner, 1 run on length on middle and leg, turned finally for one to deep midwicket
Babar to Smith, 2 runs comes down a track and pushes it a bit wide of long-on to come back for two
Babar to Smith, no run well outside off on length, Smith wants to sweep but can't connect
Irfan to Faulkner, 1 run length delivery angled across, swishes it towards cover for one
Irfan to Smith, no run Irfan appeals for lbw as Smith made room to slog but the slower delivery deceived him and he was hit on the pads well outside leg
Irfan to Smith, 1 run full toss just outside off, turned away to deep midwicket for one
Irfan to Faulkner, 2 runs short of length outside leg stump, he makes room and tucks it to third man for two
Irfan to Faulkner, 2 runs full outside off, he makes some room and crunches a drive through covers, wide of deep point in the gap for two

Irfan to Faulkner, FOUR runs finally a boundary! It was slower and coming towards the stumps from outside leg, Faulkner nearly went down on a knee and slogged it to the wide long-on boundary for a four
Tanvir to Smith, (no ball) short and wide, Smith makes room to cut and it's been called a no ball because Tanvir's back foot touched the return crease
Tanvir to Smith, no run he's bowled'im as Smith wanted to slog it to the leg side and the full delivery crashed onto the stumps
Tanvir to Smith, 2 runs slightly shorter and angled in, he swats it wide of deep midwicket for two
Tanvir to Smith, 2 runs short and wide outside off, Smith nicely pulled it without much force gently towards deep midwicket to collect two more
Tanvir to Smith, OUT bowled again, this time he has to go! Smith charged down with some room and wanted to smash it over the covers but missed it and the ball knocked over the base of off stump
Tanvir to Starc, 2 runs swinging full toss outside off, thick edge rolls down to third man
Tanvir to Starc, no run angled in towards the pads, he wants to tuck it to leg but gets it on the pads
Irfan to Faulkner, no run attempted yorker is a low full toss on leg, pushed down to mid-on
Irfan to Faulkner, 2 runs another low full toss on middle, swished away towards deep backward point for two
Irfan to Faulkner, no run low full toss number 3, it's outside off and is pushed to cover
Irfan to Faulkner, 1 run full delivery just outside off, he makes room and drives to deep point
Irfan to Starc, no run higher full toss outside off, Starc pushes it back to the bowler
Irfan to Starc, 1 run nearly in the block hole around off, he digs it out to long-on and wants two, but there's time only for one as Babar gets to it quickly
Afridi to Starc, no run offspinner form outside leg towards the pads, he defends it on leg
Afridi to Starc, 1 run closer to the stumps, inside edge off the thigh pad goes to third man for one
Afridi to Faulkner, 2 runs slightly shorter and it's turned off the back foot to deep midwicket gently, so that it doesn't reach the fielder quickly and then run two
Afridi to Faulkner, 1 run cut off the back foot towards backward point where Fawad dives to stop it
Afridi to Starc, 1 run falls safe! Flighted googly on leg, he flicked it but the googly took a top edge and went very high between mid-off and long-off. No fielder could get there on time
Afridi to Faulkner, 1 run turned to backward square leg off the back foot for one
Irfan to Faulkner, no run bouncer on the leg stump and coming in, he ducks under it
Irfan to Faulkner, no run makes room, Irfan pitches it short again, Faulkner looked to cut but missed it
Irfan to Faulkner, 2 runs attempted yorker is a low full toss on the pads and Faulkner lofts it high in the air and in the gap wide of long-on for two
Irfan to Faulkner, SIX runs he wants a six and connects to get one! This was pitched up and he slogged it well over the long-on boundary for a clean six to clear long-on
Irfan to Faulkner, 1 wide low full toss is too wide outside off for a wide

Irfan to Faulkner, OUT excellent work from Irfan. He first bowled a slower one on back of length by rolling his fingers over this one, Faulkner could not connect well and the ball went back towards the bowler. Starc was well outside the crease by now, Irfan is on the ground while stopping the ball and turns and gets a direct hit
Irfan to Faulkner, 1 run full on off and midle, tapped wide of cover for one and he keeps strike

Tanvir to Faulkner, OUT gets a wicket first ball! Short of length ball was angled in, Faulkner pulled it but this ground is big and the blow was not that powerful, Umar Amin at deep midwicket takes a few steps in to catch it
Tanvir to Kane Richardson, 1 run full and just outside off, pushed down the ground towards mid-off for one
Tanvir to Doherty, 1 run makes room and slices the full delivery from elg stump to point for one
Tanvir to Kane Richardson, 2 runs low and slow full toss outside off, it's mistimed down the ground towards long-on who runs to his left and throws at the keeper's end. They come back for two
Tanvir to Kane Richardson, 2 runs makes room for the ball that's angling in, slogged down to long-on for two more

Tanvir to Kane Richardson, FOUR runs has he got enough? He makes room to loft the full delivery from outside off to the extra cover region in the air, there's nobody in the deep and that rolls away for four
Bishen strikes again: In the last 20 years there have been only three instances of Australia scoring fewer runs after batting all 50 overs against Pakistan

6.47pm Both captains and Dean Jones had said before the match started that it was a beautiful batting pitch. These 50 overs have showed otherwise and Pakistan also bowled and fielded very well to stifle the batsmen. Warner gave a strong start and it was mainly Smith's 77 that took them beyond 200. Back in half-an-hour for the chase.
7.10pm ...aaaaand we're back. Pakistan's bowlers did quite brilliantly to restrict Australia to 231, but can their batsmen pull off this chase?
7.15pm And the players have come out. It's Ahmed Shehzad to take strike, and he will face Mitchell Starc.
Starc to Shehzad, no run length ball to start with, angling towards off stump, and maybe some late inward movement to cramp Shehzad, who tucks it away towards midwicket
Starc to Shehzad, no run slants it a little further across, outside off stump, and Shehzad lets it go
Starc to Shehzad, no run back of a length, and Shehzad shuffles across to defend off the back foot
Starc to Shehzad, no run a little fuller and wider, and Shehzad leaves again
Starc to Shehzad, no run full and even wider this time, and Shehzad won't nibble at those
Starc to Shehzad, no run back of a length outside off, and he stands up tall and punches to short cover. Starc starts with a maiden
Kane Richardson to Sarfaraz, no run sharp inward movement from outside off towards Sarfraz's midriff, and he hurriedly jams his bat down to plonk it into the leg side
Kane Richardson to Sarfaraz, no run a bit of movement in again, cramping Sarfraz from back of a length. He tucks it away to short midwicket

Kane Richardson to Sarfaraz, 1 run width this time outside off, and he steers this nicely off the back foot to the right of third man. Slips while turning at the non-striker's end, so they can't take the second run
Kane Richardson to Shehzad, no run length ball outside off, comes forward and plays a defensive push to short cover
Kane Richardson to Shehzad, no run fuller now, swinging in towards off stump, and Shehzad plays a firm push back to the bowler
Kane Richardson to Shehzad, no run full outside off, driven to the right of Maxwell at point
Starc to Sarfaraz, no run back of a length, and Sarfraz shuffles across, possibly looking to work that leg side, but the angle forces him to poke it back to the bowler
Starc to Sarfaraz, no run back of a length just outside off, keeps a touch low maybe, and Sarfraz squats a little while defending into the off side
Starc to Sarfaraz, 2 runs a little short, and Sarfraz stands tall and punches that away to the right of third man
Starc to Sarfaraz, 2 runs full outside off, and he steers this past the left hand of a diving Maxwell at backward point
Starc to Sarfaraz, 2 runs full, on the pads, clipped away very neatly to the left of deep backward square leg
Starc to Sarfaraz, 1 wide looks to bowl the bouncer and loses his action a touch, sending this down the leg side
Starc to Sarfaraz, no run length ball on middle stump, defended back to the bowler
Kane Richardson to Shehzad, no run back of a length outside off, another leave from Shehzad
Kane Richardson to Shehzad, no run back of a length outside off, decent carry through to Haddin as Shehzad leaves again
Kane Richardson to Shehzad, no run this time he swishes at the ball outside off, and the ball beats the outside edge of his angled bat
Kane Richardson to Shehzad, 1 run back of a length, a bit more width this time, and he slaps it away to the right of third man
Kane Richardson to Sarfaraz, FOUR runs length ball outside off, and Sarfraz leans into it and times it beautifully through cover
Kane Richardson to Sarfaraz, 1 run similar delivery, a little closer to off stump, and he drives it straighter, to the left of mid-off
Starc to Sarfaraz, 1 run looks to play another cover drive, but the feet don't go anywhere, and the left-arm angle causes him to edge that down to third man
Starc to Shehzad, no run back of a length, angling across. Didn't really come onto Shehzad, who waited a long time to play that back-foot defensive prod
Starc to Shehzad, no run full and wide, Shehzad doesn't quite get close enough to the ball to drive, and the ball bounces down into the pitch
Starc to Shehzad, no run full on off stump, defended to mid-on
Starc to Shehzad, 3 runs short, rising ball, and he swivels and pulls this away towards the vacant deep midwicket region. He didn't really time that, and it stops well short of the boundary
Starc to Sarfaraz, no run length ball angling across towards off stump, defended into the off side
Kane Richardson to Shehzad, no run back of a length on off stump, worked away wristily to short midwicket
Kane Richardson to Shehzad, no run a touch fuller now, angling in towards off stump. Shehzad stays on the back foot and defends towards mid-on
Kane Richardson to Shehzad, 2 runs length ball on off stump, Shehzad shuffles across and works it with the angle past short midwicket

Kane Richardson to Shehzad, 1 run full outside off, drives to the left of mid-off and sets off immediately for the single. Warner has to run around the ball to throw, and Shehzad makes his crease comfortably
Kane Richardson to Sarfaraz, 1 run back of a length, angling in towards leg stump, tucked away to deep backward square leg
Kane Richardson to Shehzad, no run fullish ball angling in towards middle stump, clipped to mid-on
Starc to Sarfaraz, 1 wide once again down the leg side, and Shehzad skips across his crease to earn his team a wide
Starc to Sarfaraz, no run back of a length outside off, steered to backward point
Starc to Sarfaraz, no run down the leg side once more, but this time it clipped Sarfraz's thigh pad as he looked to glance to fine leg
Starc to Sarfaraz, no run back of a length, a bit of shape in towards middle stump, defended towards mid-off
Starc to Sarfaraz, no run a bit of width again and Sarfraz looks to use the pace and angle to steer it wide of backward point, and hits it straight to the fielder
Starc to Sarfaraz, no run full now, and he presses forward to drive to cover
Starc to Sarfaraz, 1 run on the pads now, and he works it away to deep backward square leg
Faulkner to Sarfaraz, 1 run starts off by drifting onto the pads, and Sarfraz flicks it away to deep backward square leg
Faulkner to Shehzad, no run full outside off, and Shehzad punches firmly down the ground but is denied by Sarfraz, who couldn't get out of the way of the shot quickly enough
Faulkner to Shehzad, FOUR runs full, wide, and Shehzad frees his arms and crashes it away to the left of cover
Faulkner to Shehzad, FOUR runs this is a little shorter but just as wide, and Shehzad drills the ball through the same gap, only this one's off the back foot. This is a terrible start from Faulkner
Faulkner to Shehzad, 2 runs fuller now, width again, and Shehzad drives to the right of the cover fielder
Faulkner to Shehzad, no run full outside off, angling in, and Shehzad comes forward to defend back to the bowler
Maxwell to Sarfaraz, 1 run full and leg-stumpish, and Sarfraz flicks it away to deep square leg
Maxwell to Shehzad, no run down the track, doesn't quite reach the pitch of the ball, and adjusts to defend into the covers
Maxwell to Shehzad, 2 runs down the leg side, and Shehzad sweeps fine, to the right of deep backward square leg
Maxwell to Shehzad, 1 run length ball on the pads, tucked away towards deep backward square leg
Maxwell to Sarfaraz, no run quickish now, on middle stump, and Shehzad was looking to make room and drive inside out but it was too quick to do that and he defended towards cover in the end
Maxwell to Sarfaraz, FOUR runs down the pitch now and he lifts this over the infield to send it rolling away to the deep midwicket boundary
Faulkner to Shehzad, no run back of a length, angling in towards Shehzad's ribcage, and he gets on his toes to defend towards short midwicket
Faulkner to Shehzad, no run length ball, angling in towards off stump, defended to mid-off
Faulkner to Shehzad, no run down the track and Faulkner follows him. Looks to club that over the leg side but can only inside-edge it onto his left leg
Faulkner to Shehzad, no run length ball angling in towards off stump, pushed to mid-off
Faulkner to Shehzad, no run dropped! Shehzad came down the track again and played a poor shot, smacking it straight into mid-on's hands, but Sean Abbott, the substitute fielder, couldn't hold on
Faulkner to Shehzad, FOUR runs down the track again and this time he makes room and lofts gloriously over extra cover
Maxwell to Sarfaraz, 5 wide full, down the leg side, and the ball runs away wide of Haddin's gloves as he shuffles across to collect
Maxwell to Sarfaraz, 1 run full, leg-stumpish, clipped to deep midwicket
Maxwell to Shehzad, no run fullish ball on the pads, and Warner dives to his left at square leg to cut off that flick
Maxwell to Shehzad, 1 run down the pitch now, and he plays a checked drive to long-on
Maxwell to Sarfaraz, 1 run goes deep in his crease to the length ball and works the ball away to deep midwicket
Maxwell to Shehzad, no run back of a length again, and he goes on the back foot to work it leg side but Warner is in the way again
Maxwell to Shehzad, 1 run a little fuller, and he clips it away to deep midwicket
Doherty to Shafiq, no run tossed up on off stump, driven to short cover
Doherty to Shafiq, no run length ball on off, turns away a decent amount, and he waits on it and dabs it towards point
Doherty to Shafiq, no run fuller, on middle stump, defended watchfully off the front foot
Doherty to Shafiq, FOUR runs short, wide, and Shafiq rocks back and crashes it away through the gap between point and cover
Doherty to Shafiq, no run fuller now, outside off, and he comes forward and defends towards point
Faulkner to Sarfaraz, 1 run back of a length on off stump, and Sarfraz shuffles across to work the ball to deep backward square leg
Faulkner to Shafiq, 1 leg bye back of a length, angling down the leg side, Shafiq tucks it away towards square leg
Faulkner to Sarfaraz, 1 run back of a length on middle stump, clipped to deep square leg
Faulkner to Shafiq, no run back of a length, angling in, and he pokes at the ball outside off and the inside-edge cannons into his pads
Faulkner to Shafiq, no run back of a length, a bit straighter, defended back to the bowler
Faulkner to Shafiq, 1 run back of a length outside off, guided to third man with an open face
Doherty to Shafiq, 1 run full on middle and leg, driven past the diving bowler to long-on
Doherty to Sarfaraz, no run fullish ball on off stump, defended with soft hands to backward point
Doherty to Sarfaraz, no run length ball on off stump, defended to short cover

Doherty to Sarfaraz, no run turn now, quick turn from back of a length and beats Sarfraz's bat as he looks to prod it away through the off side. Haddin whipped the bails off and appealed, and they go up to the third umpire. Sarfraz did lift his foot, but he brought it down just in time
Doherty to Sarfaraz, 1 run fuller now, and he gets his front foot out and drives to the right of point
Doherty to Shafiq, 1 run down the pitch now and Shafiq drives to long-off
Faulkner to Shafiq, no run whipped in the air but the ball lands short of short midwicket
Faulkner to Shafiq, no run length ball on off stump, punched to mid-on
Faulkner to Shafiq, no run back of a length outside off, punched to short cover
Faulkner to Shafiq, no run length ball, angling in and giving no room. Shafiq pushes it to mid-on
Faulkner to Shafiq, 1 run angle brings it into the pads now, and he tucks it away to deep square leg
Faulkner to Sarfaraz, 1 run back of a length, angling in towards off, and Sarfraz lets it come to him and dabs it towards third man
Doherty to Sarfaraz, 1 run length ball on the stumps, and Sarfraz loves to sweep, hits that firmly down to deep backward square leg
Doherty to Shafiq, no run only a touch short, and he's back in his crease in a flash but can't beat short cover with that slap
Doherty to Shafiq, no run down the pitch now and Doherty bowls it quick and flat, defended back to the bowler
Doherty to Shafiq, 1 run shortish ball outside off, and he cuts it to point, who's standing on the edge of the circle
Doherty to Sarfaraz, 1 run length ball on middle stump, Sarfraz makes room and dabs it to point

Doherty to Shafiq, FOUR runs short ball, and Shafiq pulls it away over short midwicket. Hughes sprints a long way from long-on and dives, but only succeeds in dragging himself and the ball over the rope
Faulkner to Sarfaraz, 1 run short ball on off stump, pulled away to deep square leg
Faulkner to Shafiq, no run length ball on off stump, and Shafiq hits it back to the bowler, not quite managing to time that firm drive down the ground
Faulkner to Shafiq, no run back of a length now, and Shafiq pokes it back to the bowler
Faulkner to Shafiq, 1 run back of a length on off stump, and Shafiq pulls it away to deep midwicket
Faulkner to Sarfaraz, no run back of a length on off stump, poked away to point
Faulkner to Sarfaraz, 1 run length ball on off stump, and Sarfraz lets it come to him and guides it to third man

Doherty to Sarfaraz, 1 run, OUT sweeps from the stumps again, towards deep midwicket. Starc ran to his left from deep backward square and let rip a flat throw to the keeper as the batsmen looked to take him on and run a second. Sarfraz dives into his crease, but his bat crosses the line a crucial instant after Haddin whips the bails off
Doherty to Fawad Alam, no run tossed up around off on length, Fawad tucks it to midwicket
Doherty to Fawad Alam, no run leans forward and blocks it outside off
Doherty to Fawad Alam, no run slightly short of length outside off, Fawad waits for it and guides to short third man

Doherty to Fawad Alam, OUT that's another wicket, but the umpires are going up! Fawad swept it fine down the leg side, Smith was at first slip and he ran like a hare towards leg slip in anticipation just after the ball was delivered and takes what looks like an easy catch at leg slip. Great anticipation after he saw Fawad get into position to sweep. T
Doherty to Maqsood, no run another chance, umpire goes up for stumping! Beaten by the turn outside off with a forward push, Haddin whips the bails off but his back toe is just inside the crease
Kane Richardson to Shafiq, no run back of length outside off, he pokes and misses as it shapes away
Kane Richardson to Shafiq, no run persists outside off and this one's pushed down towards mid-off
Kane Richardson to Shafiq, 2 runs short ball, he pulls and a top edge flies right over Haddin for two in the gap
Kane Richardson to Shafiq, no run coming in from back of length towards off, he defends it back
Kane Richardson to Shafiq, FOUR runs short ball angled in, and it goes off the glove down the leg side just wide of Haddin's left glove as he leapt full length for that
Kane Richardson to Shafiq, no run back of length outside off, he lets it go
Doherty to Maqsood, no run fullish outside off, driven firmly to cover
Doherty to Maqsood, no run shorter on the stumps and he defends on the leg side
Doherty to Maqsood, no run on length on middle and turning towards off, keeps a bit low as he whips it down to mid-on
Doherty to Maqsood, 3 runs goes on the back foot again and that's turned past midwicket against the turn to get off the mark
Doherty to Shafiq, 1 run shorter and much wider, cut off the back foot to long-off
Doherty to Maqsood, no run bit of flight on middle and leg, Maqsood defends it back
Kane Richardson to Shafiq, no run back of length outside off, driven off the front foot to point where Maxwell dives to his right and stops
Kane Richardson to Shafiq, 1 run shorter outside off, guides it late towards third man for one
Kane Richardson to Maqsood, 2 runs similar length well outside off, punched off the back foot to deep backward point for two
Kane Richardson to Maqsood, no run brings it closer to off stump from short of length, Maqsood helps it to midwicket
Kane Richardson to Maqsood, no run bangs in another short one outside off, the batsman defends off the toes
Kane Richardson to Maqsood, no run stays back and cuts it late towards third man but backward point dives to his left and stops it
Doherty to Shafiq, no run slow through the air around middle, he comes down and blocks
Doherty to Shafiq, no run on length around off, waits for it to turn and cuts towards cover point
Doherty to Shafiq, no run flighted on middle with turn, pushed to point with a forward lean
Doherty to Shafiq, no run length delivery on off with away turn, cuts off the back foot to cover
Doherty to Shafiq, no run comes down a step and drives the length ball with the turn to short cover
Doherty to Shafiq, no run flighted on middle, Shaifq stays in and defends. That's a maiden
Smith to Maqsood, 1 run flighted and full outside off, drives it firmly down to long-off
Smith to Shafiq, no run shorter outside off, cuts off the back foot to cover after the turn
Smith to Shafiq, 1 run another cut off the back foot as it pitched closer to off, goes to deep point
Smith to Maqsood, no run slightly quicker outside off, he looks to cut it late and misses
Smith to Maqsood, 1 run flighted on the pads, driven down to mid-on
Smith to Shafiq, 1 run shorter and wider outside off, pulled off the back foot to long-on
Doherty to Shafiq, FOUR runs comes down the track and he whips it with his wrists against the turn from middle stump to the midwicket boundary for a four in the gap. Excellent shot
Doherty to Shafiq, 1 run makes some room to push it down past short cover for one
Doherty to Maqsood, no run flatter on off, pushed to mid-on against the turn
Doherty to Maqsood, no run flighted on middle and leg, flicked firmly straight to midwicket
Doherty to Maqsood, 1 run flighted on leg stump, driven down to long-on for one
Doherty to Shafiq, 1 wide drifts down the leg side for a wide past the pads
Doherty to Shafiq, no run flighted outside off, he leans forward and blocks it
Smith to Maqsood, 1 run flighted and full on middle, drives it down to long-off
Smith to Shafiq, 1 run on length outside off and turning away, chops it off the back foot to deep point
Smith to Maqsood, no run fuller outside off, slices it late to backward point
Smith to Maqsood, no run straighter one on middle stump, pushed back to the bowler
Smith to Maqsood, 1 run flighted again, smashed back and the ball flies towards cover after hitting the non-striker's bat
Smith to Shafiq, no run outside off on length, pushed back to the bowler
Maxwell to Maqsood, no run turning it in from middle, tucked to square leg
Maxwell to Maqsood, 1 run on middle again, tucked off the back foot to deep midwicket
Maxwell to Shafiq, 1 run fuller outside off, drives it down to long-off
Maxwell to Maqsood, no run goes back and chops it late to point
Maxwell to Maqsood, no run flighted on the leg stump, flicked straight to midwicket
Maxwell to Maqsood, no run on middle and he goes back again to whip it straight to midwicket
Starc to Shafiq, 1 run angles it in from outside off, tucked off the back foot to backward square leg
Starc to Maqsood, no run slightly fuller towards off stump, driven down to mid-on
Starc to Maqsood, 1 leg bye angled towards the pads now, it hits the pads and goes towards midwicket or a leg bye
Starc to Shafiq, 5 wide the angle is too much and that one goes past the batsman, past the keeper and goes down leg for four
Starc to Shafiq, 1 run fuller on the middle stump, clipped to deep backward square leg for one
Starc to Maqsood, no run in the block hole on off, Sohaib digs it back to the bowler
Starc to Maqsood, 1 run nearly a yorker on middle and leg, flicked to deep midwicket for one
Maxwell to Maqsood, 1 run chipped in the air past the bowler to long-on for one
Maxwell to Shafiq, no run turns with a lean to midwicket
Maxwell to Shafiq, 2 runs gets into position early and sweeps it fine down leg for two runs
Maxwell to Shafiq, no run pushes off the front foot towards off but thick inside edge goes to the leg side
Maxwell to Shafiq, FOUR runs full on the pads and Shafiq knows where the gap is. He goes down on a knee and sweeps it in the air to the backward square leg area for four
Maxwell to Shafiq, 1 wide spins it well down leg for a wide
Maxwell to Shafiq, 1 run almost going for another wide, swatted to fine leg for one
Starc to Shafiq, no run on length outside off with the angle, left alone
Starc to Shafiq, no run length delivery outside off again, chopped straight to backward point
Starc to Shafiq, no run pitches it a touch shorter, he looked to cut it late but missed the edge
Starc to Shafiq, no run on length on the pads now, clipped to midwicket
Starc to Shafiq, 1 run wide full toss outside off, steered to deep point for one
Starc to Maqsood, 1 run on the pads again, tucked down to fine leg for one more
Doherty to Maqsood, 1 run pitched outside off and that's lofted towards sweeper cover for one and that's the 50 stand
Doherty to Shafiq, no run comes down a step to push it down, Doherty gets a hand that goes towards cover
Doherty to Shafiq, no run goes on the back foot to cut but that was very close to middle stump. He did get bat on it
Doherty to Shafiq, 1 run turned away to the leg side now against the turn towards square leg
Doherty to Maqsood, FOUR runs full in the zone and Sohaib slogs it taking the aerial route to the wide long on area by going down on a knee
Doherty to Maqsood, no run towards middle and leg on length, nearly scooped to cover off the front foot. Reaches the fielder after a bounce
Kane Richardson to Shafiq, no run short of length towards off and middle, defends it to mid-on
Kane Richardson to Shafiq, no run angled in sharply from outside off, doesn't have enough room to put it away on the leg side
Kane Richardson to Shafiq, 1 run short, pulled powerfully to the leg side and Warner in the deep dives to his right at deep backward square leg and throws it back immediately
Kane Richardson to Maqsood, no run defends the back of length delivery from outside off back to the bowler
Kane Richardson to Maqsood, no run cuts it in from outside off, he defends it again
Kane Richardson to Maqsood, 1 run pulled in the air, Warner is in the deep but falls well short of him, and wide too, as he runs to his right and cuts it to one
Doherty to Maqsood, no run flattish outside off, he comes down and defends it back
Doherty to Maqsood, SIX runs bit shorter and on middle stump and the tall man rocks back to smack it over the midwicket boundary for six! He got in position very early
Doherty to Maqsood, 2 runs swishes outside off and thick outside edge rolls away towards third man for two
Doherty to Maqsood, FOUR runs on the other side now - four more! He got some room outside off and lofted it inside out in the gap between long off and sweeper cover
Doherty to Maqsood, 2 runs another excellent shot, it won't go for four though. Got little room outside off and it was chopped wide of deep point for two in the gap
Doherty to Maqsood, no run leans forward and defends the length delivery back to the bowler

Kane Richardson to Shafiq, 3 runs cut off the back foot outside off, it's rolling away to deep backward point and Doherty slides to his right to cut it in, but the ball still rolls away and might have hit his cap which fell behind him when he was sliding. Umpire says it's three runs
Kane Richardson to Maqsood, no run back of length and coming in, he defends towards cover
Kane Richardson to Maqsood, no run punches the short of length ball around off back to the bowler
Kane Richardson to Shafiq, no run short ball again, goes over the batsman towards the leg side as he ducks
Kane Richardson to Shafiq, 1 run short of length and angled in, tucked away to fine leg for one and he keeps strike
Maxwell to Shafiq, 1 run flighted on leg, drives it down to long-on for one
Maxwell to Umar Amin, 1 run flighted around off, he drives it wide of cover point to get off the mark
Maxwell to Shafiq, 1 run flighted just outside leg, clipped towards backward square leg
Maxwell to Umar Amin, no run flighted and full outside off, drives off the front foot to point
Maxwell to Umar Amin, 1 run flight and drift towards middle stump, pushed down the ground to long-off
Maxwell to Shafiq, 1 run comes down the track and tucks it with the turn to long-on to bring up his fifty
Faulkner to Shafiq, no run short ball angled in, he wants to pull but it doesn't bounce so much and he gets hit around the groin

Faulkner to Shafiq, OUT angled in from wide of the crease, Shafiq was stuck on the crease, and the break has given Australia a breakthrough! Shafiq checks with Amin whether he should review, and Amin says no, and you can see why he said that. It struck him below the knee-roll, on the crease, in front of middle stump.
Faulkner to Afridi, no run greets him with a bouncer, and Afridi ducks under it
Faulkner to Afridi, no run back of a length, angling across, and Afridi defends with soft hands, off the back foot
Faulkner to Afridi, 1 wide another bouncer, outside the line of off stump, Afridi lets it go
Faulkner to Afridi, no run back of a length, angling in towards off stump, and that's a compact-looking backfoot defensive shot
Faulkner to Afridi, no run length ball outside off, fuller than the previous one, and Afridi shows he can defend solidly off the front foot too
Starc to Umar Amin, 1 leg bye slants this into the pads, and Amin works it towards midwicket
Starc to Afridi, no run lovely delivery, angling across Afridi and leaving him slightly off the pitch. He pokes and he's beaten
Starc to Afridi, 1 run fuller now, on off stump, and it's driven down to the man at deep cover
Starc to Umar Amin, no run back of a length, angling in towards off stump, blocked off the back foot, back to the bowler
Starc to Umar Amin, 1 wide looks to get it a little fuller and straighter, and overdoes the straighter, slanting it down the leg side
Starc to Umar Amin, no run back of a length, lovely off-stump line, no room at all, and Amin can only defend it to the bowler
Starc to Umar Amin, 1 wide aaaand again. This one's even wider down the leg side
Starc to Umar Amin, no run back of a length and a bit of bounce outside off. Amin pokes at it with no footwork and the ball beats his edge
Faulkner to Afridi, 1 run back of a length outside off, punched to deep cover
Faulkner to Umar Amin, no run back of a length outside off, shuffles across and defends to point
Faulkner to Umar Amin, 2 runs a bit of extra bounce outside off and Amin plays that no-footwork prod again. The outside edge runs away towards third man
Faulkner to Umar Amin, no run fuller now, a little closer to off stump, and he comes forward and pushes towards mid-off
Faulkner to Umar Amin, 1 run full again, a bigger stride now to drive to the right of mid-off
Faulkner to Afridi, 1 leg bye on the pads, and he gets a leg bye to short fine leg as he misses connecting with the flick

Kane Richardson to Afridi, FOUR runs what a shot! That was a back of a length ball outside off, and he simply shuffled across and hoicked that away with a flick of the wrist wide of the short fine leg fielder
Kane Richardson to Afridi, no run short, wide, cut straight to Maxwell at point
Kane Richardson to Afridi, no run full now, angling in towards middle stump. Afridi stays leg-side of the ball and defends towards cover
Kane Richardson to Anwar Ali, no run length ball in the corridor outside off, and it straightens just a touch and beats the outside edge as Anwar pokes uncertainly at it
Kane Richardson to Anwar Ali, no run back of a length outside off, Anwar lets it go through to the keeper
Starc to Umar Amin, 1 run short, a bit of width, and that's punched very sweetly into the gap at extra cover
Starc to Anwar Ali, no run length ball on off stump, Anwar defends after coming halfway forward
Starc to Anwar Ali, no run back of a length, starts on leg and middle, but Anwar is wary of the angle across and plays with a full face towards cover
Starc to Anwar Ali, no run wider now, and Anwar lets it go outside off
Starc to Anwar Ali, 1 leg bye full and leg-stumpish. Anwar misses the flick and the ball ricochets off his pad towards square leg
Starc to Umar Amin, no run back of a length outside off, and that's a good-looking punch to short cover
Faulkner to Anwar Ali, no run fullish ball, angling in, and Anwar comes forward to push to cover
Faulkner to Anwar Ali, no run back of a length now, and he defends it back towards the bowler
Faulkner to Anwar Ali, 1 run a touch straighter now, and he nurdles it away towards short midwicket
Faulkner to Umar Amin, 1 run slower yorker on off and middle, worked away towards midwicket
Faulkner to Anwar Ali, no run back of a length on off, and he waits and dabs it away towards point

Faulkner to Anwar Ali, SIX runs length ball outside off, and Anwar hits it down the ground, over the bowler's head, with a straight bat and a full extension of the arms, and the ball sails over the long-on boundary
Maxwell to Umar Amin, no run full and flat, fired in towards off stump, and he opens his bat face to jab that away towards point
Maxwell to Umar Amin, 1 run full again, but slanting down the leg side, and he tickles it away towards short fine leg
Maxwell to Anwar Ali, no run full on off stump, pushed back to the bowler
Maxwell to Anwar Ali, no run full outside off, steered to point

Maxwell to Anwar Ali, 2 byes goes back as Maxwell angles this across, and looks to push it through cover, but the ball goes with the angle and beats his edge. It ricochets off Haddin and runs away towards fine leg
Maxwell to Anwar Ali, no run fuller this time, and he comes forward and drives firmly to the left of the bowler, and Maxwell dives full-length to cut off the ball
Faulkner to Umar Amin, 2 runs short ball, and Amin swivels to pull this to the left of the man at deep midwicket
Faulkner to Umar Amin, 1 run on the pads now, and he clips it away towards deep square leg
Faulkner to Anwar Ali, no run slower ball, angled in towards off stump. Anwar comes forward and defends back to the bowler
Faulkner to Anwar Ali, 1 run length ball, angled towards middle and leg, and he pushes it down the ground to long-on

Faulkner to Umar Amin, FOUR runs short ball, and he times this pull beautifully to beat the deep square leg fielder haring around the boundary and diving full-length to his right. Could have done better, Sean Abbott
Faulkner to Umar Amin, 1 run slower ball, full on leg stump, clipped down to deep backward square leg
Starc to Umar Amin, no run fullish ball, angling in, and he comes forward and drives to mid-off
Starc to Umar Amin, 1 run on middle stump now, and Amin flicks it away to deep backward square leg
Starc to Anwar Ali, 1 run back of a length, worked off the hips into the vacant midwicket region
Starc to Umar Amin, no run back of a length, angling in and tucking him up for room, and Amin is forced to defend back to the bowler
Starc to Umar Amin, 2 runs short ball on off stump, and he rides the bounce and steers it away to the left of third man to bring up Pakistan's 200
Starc to Umar Amin, no run full and wide, and it was there to drive, but it bounced crazily, beat his edge, and Haddin had to jump up and parry the ball over his head
Kane Richardson to Anwar Ali, no run fullish ball outside off, driven to mid-off
Kane Richardson to Anwar Ali, 2 runs shortish ball, angling in and rising towards the midriff. He jumps to get on top of the bounce and nudges it away towards fine leg
Kane Richardson to Anwar Ali, no run full and wide, and he drives this firmly and short cover does well to stop that diving to his left
Kane Richardson to Anwar Ali, no run full again, driven down to mid-off. Went hard at it and didn't time it
Kane Richardson to Anwar Ali, 1 run short outside off, and he gets on top of the bounce and bunts it down to third man
Kane Richardson to Umar Amin, no run short ball, and Amin looks at the umpire after he ducks under it, wondering if it might be called wide for height. It isn't
Starc to Anwar Ali, no run length ball on the pads, clipped to midwicket
Starc to Anwar Ali, no run very full outside off, and the ball sneaks under Anwar's bat as he looks to jab it away through the off side
Starc to Anwar Ali, 1 run length ball on leg stump, gets an inside edge that hits the pad and dribbles towards midwicket as he looks to drive down the ground
Starc to Tanvir, 1 wide and that's a welcome run for Pakistan, Starc angling one too far down the leg side
Starc to Tanvir, no run full outside off, driven to short cover with a checked follow-through
Starc to Tanvir, no run back of a length outside off, and he defends off the back foot, playing extremely late, and the ball bounces through to the keeper
Kane Richardson to Anwar Ali, 1 run back of a length outside off, guided down to third man
Kane Richardson to Tanvir, no run back of a length, angling across towards off stump, poked away to point
Kane Richardson to Tanvir, no run back of a length on off stump, defended to point off the back foot. Looked quite compact there
Kane Richardson to Tanvir, 2 runs on the pads now, and it's clipped away towards deep backward square leg
Kane Richardson to Tanvir, no run length ball outside off, super front-foot stride out to defend into the covers
Kane Richardson to Tanvir, no run a little wider outside off now, and Tanvir drives to short cover
Faulkner to Babar, no run short ball first up, and Babar ducks hurriedly under it

Faulkner to Babar, 1 run oh my. Faulkner might have fluffed up an easy run out, or has he? That was back of a length, and Babar pushed it towards cover point. Maxwell ran from backward point and threw to the bowler. Both batsmen had set off, and the run simply wasn't on. When Faulkner collected, Babar was a long way from the stumps. He swished at the
Faulkner to Tanvir, 1 run full now, and he drives this down to long-on
Faulkner to Babar, FOUR runs back of a length now, and he gets on his toes and works it off his ribcage down to the fine leg boundary
Faulkner to Babar, 1 run back of a length on off stump, and he dabs it away to third man
Maxwell to Babar, no run fullish ball on off stump, driven into the covers
Maxwell to Babar, 1 run on the pads now, and it's worked away to square leg
Maxwell to Tanvir, no run tossed up on off stump, in the blockhole, and he looks to flick but can only hit it into his own boot
Maxwell to Tanvir, no run looks to sweep from outside off and misses, and is hit on the front pad

Maxwell to Tanvir, SIX runs tossed up on off stump, and he's simply extended his arms to send that over the rope at long-off. There were a few iceboxes beyond the boundary, and Smith ran back and landed on one of them as he dived over the rope in a desperate attempt to catch that. Could have easily hurt himself
Maxwell to Tanvir, no run quickish ball outside off, pushed into the off side
Doherty to Babar, 1 run pushed through on off stump, worked away to long-on past Doherty, who ran to his right and dived to try and save the single
Doherty to Tanvir, 1 run length ball on off stump, worked away to deep backward square leg
Doherty to Babar, 2 runs full on middle and leg, worked away towards deep square leg

Doherty to Babar, 2 runs back of a length, goes with the angle towards middle and leg, and Babar looks to make room and punch through cover and gets a lucky edge that runs away towards the third man boundary
Doherty to Babar, no run length ball on off stump, pushed to mid-on
Doherty to Babar, 2 runs down the pitch, and he's drilled that through the short cover fielder. Long-off runs around to his left and keeps it down to two
Maxwell to Tanvir, no run looks for the big slog sweep from outside off, misses, is hit on the midriff
Maxwell to Irfan, no run length ball angled across, and Irfan leans forward, threatening to fall over, and blocks
Maxwell to Irfan, no run goes for the big slog and misses, but this was bowled wide outside off so he survives
Maxwell to Irfan, no run tosses it up outside off once again, and Irfan swings and misses once again

11.00pm Whew. What a game. Pakistan went into that final over with only two runs left to get. Here's what Maxwell did - 0W000W. A double-wicket maiden. Pakistan simply fluffed it, slogging away at Maxwell when some fairly sensible batting from the lower order had taken them to the cusp of victory. As it happens, Australia have wrapped up a 3-0 series win and
Steven Smith is the man of the series, but Danny Morrison doesn't seem to want to talk to him.
11.15pm Presentation time.

11.25pm And that's it from all of us. Hope you enjoyed following our ball-by-ball coverage. Until next time, it's good night from Vishal, me, and all the scorers. Before we go, here's one last comment:
Australia won by 1 run
Player of the match is Glenn Maxwell, AUS
